titles.title: Second Look at Drug Patents Act of 2020
Second Look at Drug Patents Act of 2020
A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with respect to the listing of patents in the Orange Book.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Second Look at Drug Patents Act of 2020
This bill imposes additional patent reporting requirements on the manufacturers of certain drugs approved by the Federal Drug Administration.
